hi guys! i've been visiting singapore since wednesday and i've used a getgo car twice since then (from airport to my hotel on wednesday and today a longer drive around singapore)now they have suspended my account and are demanding that i pay a combined 800 sgd of "clean up fees" cause i smoked in the cars.. 🤦‍♀️ does anyone have any idea if i can end up in trouble if i just ignore it and don't pay?
im not sure if u can run without paying. getgo is one of the car sharing providers in singapore. all these car sharing providers often over charge like this
yeah but like they weren't able to charge my card and i'm leaving in three weeks.. like what can they even do if i don't pay?
They cant do shit to u
U are a piece of thrash for smoking in the car lol
I’m at the land down under 🤭
Can cut jo teo n Chee hong salary?
Maybe u shld sue the doctor tht handled u when u were born. Cos i think he/she dropped u
Sis I think I know why u drive grab alr
Be a law abiding person. If you are guilty  pay up. If not  dispute.
So I can complain then get myself $8 voucher
Wah then should cut airport boss salary too sia  and Singtel  etc
